title.rendered: Building to Sell Amazon FBA Business –  with Dave Storey of AFBTS Part 2

content.rendered:
Podcast: Play in new window | Download (Duration: 31:44 — 29.0MB)

Subscribe: Spotify | Email | RSS

Podcast (10k-podcast): Play in new window | Download (Duration: 31:44 — 29.0MB)

Subscribe: Spotify | Email | TuneIn | RSS

We are still with Dave Storey from Elite FBA Exits. He’s an Amazon seller who’s built and sold his own seven-figure Amazon business and is now in the business of helping other people to really maximize the value of their business or make it sellable when it was provably previously pre pretty much unsellable. Even if you have no idea of selling your business in the next while or ever, if you’ve never considered it, I would urge you to listen.

 

Click Here to get the Exit Plan 55-point Checklist for FREE.

 

You’ll Learn: 

  • The 4 main pitfalls that you see sellers falling into
  • Tips on reducing the effects of not maximizing the time to sell
  • To understand how a business is valued
  • To know what work on in their exit strategy
